member.name: T:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Areas.Client.ClientProgramsController
member.summary: Provides API endpoints for retrieving and managing client-specific program data for the authenticated user.
member.remarks: This controller requires the user to be authenticated. All actions operate in the context of the currently logged-in user and return appropriate HTTP responses for unauthorized access or invalid requests.
member.param: The service used to access and manage client program information.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Areas.Client.ClientProgramsController.#ctor(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.Services.ClientServices.ClientProgramsService)
member.summary: Provides API endpoints for retrieving and managing client-specific program data for the authenticated user.
member.remarks: This controller requires the user to be authenticated. All actions operate in the context of the currently logged-in user and return appropriate HTTP responses for unauthorized access or invalid requests.
member.param: The service used to access and manage client program information.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Areas.Client.ClientProgramsController.GetActivePrograms
member.summary: Retrieves the list of active programs associated with the currently authenticated user.
member.returns: An containing a collection of objects representing the user's active programs. Returns an unauthorized response if the user is not authenticated, or a bad request response if an error occurs.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Areas.Client.ClientProgramsController.GetProgramById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the details of a specific program by its unique identifier.
member.remarks: This endpoint requires the caller to be an authenticated user. If the user is not authorized to access the requested program, an unauthorized response is returned.
member.param: The unique identifier of the program to retrieve.
member.returns: An containing the program details if found; otherwise, an appropriate error response such as 401 Unauthorized or 400 Bad Request.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Areas.Client.ClientProgramsController.GetProgramWeeks(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves all weeks associated with the specified program.
member.param: The unique identifier of the program for which to retrieve weeks.
member.returns: An containing a collection of objects representing the weeks in the specified program. Returns 401 Unauthorized if the user is not authenticated or does not have access to the program. Returns 400 Bad Request if an error occurs.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Areas.Client.ClientProgramsController.GetWeekDays(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves all program days associated with the specified week.
member.param: The unique identifier of the week for which to retrieve program days.
member.returns: An containing a collection of objects for the specified week. Returns 401 Unauthorized if the user is not authenticated, or 400 Bad Request if an error occurs.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Areas.Client.ClientProgramsController.GetDayById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the details of a specific program day by its unique identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the program day to retrieve.
member.returns: An containing the program day details if found; otherwise, an appropriate error response such as 401 Unauthorized or 400 Bad Request.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Areas.Trainer.TrainerProfileController.GetMyProfile
member.summary: Retrieves the profile details of the currently authenticated trainer.
member.remarks: This endpoint requires the user to be authenticated. The response includes detailed profile information for the trainer associated with the current user account.

member.name: T:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.AccountController
member.summary: Provides API endpoints for user account registration and authentication operations.
member.remarks: This controller exposes endpoints for registering new users and authenticating existing users, including support for standard and Google-based authentication. All endpoints return appropriate HTTP responses based on the outcome of the requested operation.
member.param: The account service used to perform user registration and authentication operations. Cannot be null.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.AccountController.#ctor(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.Contracts.ExternalServices.IAccountService)
member.summary: Provides API endpoints for user account registration and authentication operations.
member.remarks: This controller exposes endpoints for registering new users and authenticating existing users, including support for standard and Google-based authentication. All endpoints return appropriate HTTP responses based on the outcome of the requested operation.
member.param: The account service used to perform user registration and authentication operations. Cannot be null.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.AccountController.Register(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.DTOs.Account.RegisterRequest)
member.summary: Registers a new user account using the provided registration details.
member.remarks: This endpoint is typically used to create a new user account. The request data is expected as form data. If registration fails due to validation or other errors, a 400 Bad Request response is returned with an error message.
member.param: The registration information submitted by the client. Must include all required user details as specified by the registration process. Cannot be null.
member.returns: An containing the newly created user's information if registration is successful; otherwise, a bad request response with error details.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.AccountController.Login(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.DTOs.Account.LoginRequest)
member.summary: Authenticates a user with the provided login credentials and returns user information if authentication is successful.
member.param: The login credentials submitted by the client. Must include valid username and password values.
member.returns: An containing a if authentication succeeds; otherwise, a bad request response with error details.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.AccountController.GoogleAuth(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.DTOs.Account.GoogleAuthRequest)
member.summary: Authenticates a user using Google credentials and returns user information if authentication is successful.
member.param: The Google authentication request containing the user's credentials. Cannot be null.
member.returns: An ActionResult containing the authenticated user's information if successful; otherwise, a BadRequest result with error details.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.AccountController.UpdateProfile(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.DTOs.Account.UpdateProfileRequest)
member.summary: Updates the authenticated user's profile with the specified information.
member.remarks: This endpoint requires authentication. Only the currently authenticated user's profile can be updated using this method.
member.param: An object containing the new profile details to apply. Cannot be null.
member.returns: An containing the updated user profile if the update is successful; otherwise, a bad request response with error details.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.AccountController.ChangePassword(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.DTOs.Account.ChangePasswordRequest)
member.summary: Changes the current user's password using the specified password change request.
member.remarks: This endpoint requires authentication. The user must provide their current password and a valid new password as specified by the application's password policy.
member.param: An object containing the current password and the new password to set. Must not be null.
member.returns: An containing a UserResponse if the password change is successful; otherwise, a BadRequest result with error details.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.AccountController.SendResetPasswordLink(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.DTOs.Account.ForgetPasswordRequest)
member.summary: Sends a password reset link to the email address specified in the request.
member.param: The request containing the user's email address for which to send the reset password link. Cannot be null.
member.returns: An indicating the result of the operation. Returns a success response if the reset password email was sent; otherwise, returns a bad request response with an error message.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.AccountController.ResetPassword(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.DTOs.Account.ResetPasswordRequest)
member.summary: Resets the user's password using the information provided in the request.
member.param: The request containing the user's password reset information. Must not be null.
member.returns: An containing a if the password reset is successful; otherwise, a bad request response with error details.

member.name: T:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.ChatController
member.summary: Provides API endpoints for managing chat threads and messages for authenticated users.
member.remarks: All actions in this controller require the user to be authenticated. The controller enables users to retrieve their chat threads, view messages within a thread, send messages, and mark messages or entire threads as read. Most endpoints return results in a standard response format indicating success or failure. For real-time messaging, consider using SignalR in addition to these endpoints.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.ChatController.#ctor(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.Contracts.Services.IChatService,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.ChatController})
member.summary: Provides API endpoints for managing chat threads and messages for authenticated users.
member.remarks: All actions in this controller require the user to be authenticated. The controller enables users to retrieve their chat threads, view messages within a thread, send messages, and mark messages or entire threads as read. Most endpoints return results in a standard response format indicating success or failure. For real-time messaging, consider using SignalR in addition to these endpoints.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.ChatController.GetUserChats
member.summary: Get all chat threads for the current user

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.ChatController.GetThreadMessages(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get messages for a specific thread

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.ChatController.SendMessage(System.Int32,ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.DTOs.Messaging.SendMessageRequest)
member.summary: Sends a new message to the specified chat thread.
member.remarks: Returns an unauthorized response if the user is not authenticated. The message is sent on behalf of the currently authenticated user.
member.param: The unique identifier of the chat thread to which the message will be sent.
An object containing the details of the message to send, including content and any relevant metadata. Cannot be null.
member.returns: An ActionResult containing an ApiResponse with the details of the sent message if successful; otherwise, an error response.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.ChatController.MarkMessageAsRead(System.Int64)
member.summary: Mark a message as read

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.ChatController.MarkThreadAsRead(System.Int32)
member.summary: Mark entire thread as read

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.ChatController.CreateChatThread(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.DTOs.Messaging.CreateChatThreadRequest)
member.summary: Create a new chat thread between the current user and another user

member.name: T:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.NotificationsController
member.summary: API controller that manages user notifications, including retrieving, counting, and updating notification status for the authenticated user.
member.remarks: All endpoints require the user to be authenticated. This controller provides actions to retrieve notifications, get the count of unread notifications, and mark notifications as read. It is intended to be used by client applications to manage notification state for the current user.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.NotificationsController.#ctor(ITI.Gymunity.FP.Application.Contracts.Services.INotificationService,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.NotificationsController})
member.summary: API controller that manages user notifications, including retrieving, counting, and updating notification status for the authenticated user.
member.remarks: All endpoints require the user to be authenticated. This controller provides actions to retrieve notifications, get the count of unread notifications, and mark notifications as read. It is intended to be used by client applications to manage notification state for the current user.

member.name: T:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Middlewares.WebhookSecurityMiddlewareExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for registering the WebhookSecurityMiddleware in an ASP.NET Core application's request pipeline.

member.name: M:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Middlewares.WebhookSecurityMiddlewareExtensions.UseWebhookSecurity(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Adds middleware to the application's request pipeline to validate and secure incoming webhook requests.
member.remarks: This extension method should be called early in the middleware pipeline to ensure that webhook requests are validated before further processing. It is typically used when configuring web applications that receive webhook callbacks from external services.
member.param: The application builder to configure the middleware pipeline.
member.returns: The original instance with the webhook security middleware configured.
